title.rendered: General Health Camp conducted at Mission education centre Karuna

content.rendered: A general medical camp was conducted on the 5th of November for all the children of Mission Education centre Karuna. A dentist, general physician and an eye checking technician provided their services to the children. The camp started in the morning and ended in the evening. No major problems were deducted and all the children had good normal health. Tablets were prescribed for all children for deworming and a session on the importance of brushing teeth was also conducted.
